column2: Difficulty with self-motivation and achieving goals. A lack of self-confidence may prevent the setting of personal goals. A general lack of enthusiasm and a tendency to feel overwhelmed by change.

Highly motivated with many goals and aspirations for the future. Vital and spontaneous, enjoying the challenge of new and adventurous paths. Irrepressible enthusiasm. A weakness lies in a tendency to exaggerate and an inability to cope with mundane activities.
Difficulty coping with the realities of everyday life, concentrating on matters at hand, and managing practical daily chores.

Practical, efficient, and hands-on. A reliable, common-sense approach to most matters. A down-to-earth manner well-suited for the daily chores of life. A weakness lies in a sometimes stubborn refusal to make changes and a tendency to stifle enthusiasm.
A lack of objectivityâ€”the ability to view life from a detached and rational perspective. Difficulty making decisions and weighing pros and cons in a logical manner.

Objective and philosophical, with a preference for viewing life from an intellectual perspective. The rational mind outweighs feelings, as the world of emotions is considered irrational. A high sense of fairness and a logical thought process. A weakness lies in viewing emotions in a disparaging light.

A disconnect from emotions. Expressing strong emotions publicly is considered horrifying. A frequent lack of compassion in relationships and a difficulty honoring personal feelings and those of others.

Speaking from the heart; compassionate and caring with a strong intuitional nature. High value placed on personal relationships, often involving a caretaker role. Sympathetic and understanding, often leading to a nurturing role with loved ones. A weakness lies in a failure to take an objective perspective when necessary and a tendency to react without thinking things through.
